00022 #ifndef apidefs_h
00023 #define apidefs_h
00024 #ifdef _WIN32
00025 // Symbols to define for the preprocessor when compiling the code:
00026 //    URIPP_STATIC: to create static library
00027 //    URIPP_EXPORTS: to create DLL library
00028 //    nothing: when using (importing) the library in an application
00029 #  ifdef URIPP_STATIC
00030 #    define URIPP_API
00031 #    define URIPP_TMPL
00032 #  else
00033 #    ifdef URIPP_EXPORTS
00034 #      define URIPP_API __declspec(dllexport)
00035 #      define URIPP_TMPL
00036 #    else
00037 #      define URIPP_API __declspec(dllimport)
00038 #      define URIPP_TMPL extern
00039 #    endif
00040 #  endif
00041 #  pragma warning (disable: 4251)
00042 #  pragma warning (disable: 4793)
00043 // Convert from linux API.
00044 #  define strcasecmp _stricmp
00045 #else
00046 #  define URIPP_API
00047 #  define URIPP_TMPL
00048 #endif /* _WIN32 */
00049 #endif
